description: The North Anna nuclear plant in Mineral, Va. is serving as a test case on earthquake safety for Northeast designs.
title: Inspecting a Virginia Plant for Quake-Resistance
title_page: Inspecting a Virginia Plant for Quake-Resistance - The New York Times
text: After weathering the East Coastâ€™s recent quake, the North Anna nuclear plant finds itself in a situation that no American reactor has ever faced before. The shock was bigger than anything its designers thought it would ever experience. Dominion employees inspected an area that they had scraped off to explore the depth of a small crack.
